abstract: Critics say that Russian shareholders have enlisted an improbable ally in their attempt to force BP to fire the chief executive of TNK-BP.
snippet: Critics say that Russian shareholders have enlisted an improbable ally in their attempt to force BP to fire the chief executive of TNK-BP.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW  BP’s billionaire Russian oil partners have characterized their dispute with the British oil giant as a shareholder revolt  in the spirit of Kirk Kerkorian’s hounding General Motors or Carl C. Icahn holding Yahoo’s feet to the fire.

headline.main: In Dispute With BP, Kremlin’s Hand Is Seen
headline.print_headline: In Dispute With BP, Kremlin’s Hand Is Seen
